sqlMap.select: SELECT service_point_use_hist.mem_num, service_point_use_hist.title_id, service_point_use_hist.server_id, service_point_use_hist.use_date, service_point_use_hist.point_amount, title_mst.title_name, server_mst.server_name FROM service_point_use_hist LEFT JOIN title_mst ON service_point_use_hist.title_id = title_mst.title_id LEFT JOIN server_mst ON service_point_use_hist.server_id = server_mst.server_id WHERE service_point_use_hist.mem_num = #value# ORDER BY service_point_use_hist.point_amount DESC, service_point_use_hist.title_id, service_point_use_hist.server_id
